name: The Settlers: Rise of an Empire - The Eastern Realm
name_original: The Settlers: Rise of an Empire - The Eastern Realm
description:
The Settlers: Rise of an Empire - The Eastern Realm is a strategy game developed by Blue Byte and Funatics Software. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
The Settlers: Rise of an Empire - The Eastern Realm is available on PC.
